content: I'm going to work on understanding MeasureReport in more depth and implementing it in Epic tonight. If anyone else will be working and wants company, let me know and I'll set up a webex where we can hang out while we work on our stuff.
And/or chat a bit and have a beer.
I'm going for a walk with Laura now and then having an early dinner. Maybe six or so Central.
Until I figure out MeasureReport or need to go to bed.

Sounds good - one of the kids is making a pub-styled dinner for us tonight (menu includes poutine!), so will be offline during that for sure. Not sure of plans after that, so if I'm around I'll message you / jump on.
(Love this idea. I'd be game for this tomorrow, but I can't make tonight, alas.)
I'm playing with this too. Since I have some experience writing the DEQM IG and making a creating a few MRs for that. The Measure was the part I never really understood.
